Package com.didactapp.didact.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActivity
    This class is a base class for all the activities in the project - it's meant to aggregate activity specific utility methods
    ChapterActivity
    This activity is a UI controller for displaying a list of chapters and managing their state
    LibraryActivity
    this activity is a view controller for displaying a grid of available books
    LoginActivity
    This activity allows user to log in to the app.
    RegisterActivity
    This activity allows users to register to the app.
    SectionActivity
    this activity is for displaying a list of sections belonging to a chapter
    SectionDetailActivity  
    SplashActivity
    This activity displays a brief loading animation at app launch
